markdownRemark.html:
At Sāvatthī.

“Mendicants, there are these four meditators. What four?

One meditator is skilled in immersion but not in the supports for immersion. …”

SN.34.6. Samādhimūlakagocarasutta (“Meditation Subjects For Immersion”)
